item.title: Hugo Syntax Highlighting
item.description: You can have code snippets highlighted so that they are easier to read on your site using Chroma, Hugo’s default syntax highlighter. It is built in Go lang and is really, really fast â€“ and for the most important parts compatible with Pygments. Chroma takes source code and other structured text and converts it into syntax highlighted HTML, ANSI-coloured text, etc.
